833510.name: Time-Skip
833510.description:
Use creative abilities to explore the facility, traversing new heights learning the reasons why you have been locked away. Solve puzzles to advance through the obstacles discovering the truth behind this mystery. Leon has various powers and abilities to solve each puzzle in several different ways. This is a challenging & enjoyable First-person puzzle adventure.

This is a great fast-paced first person puzzle challenge. A brand new indie game created by one single developer. Time-Skip uses stunning graphics and creative puzzle mechanics to provide players with a challenging new experience.

Included with this game:

8 custom designed levels full of obstacles with additional sections separated by loading screens

Logic & Timing challenges

Over 10 full songs and game sounds

High quality graphics and excellent frame-rate

Abilities to traverse each level, unlock more as you continue

A brand new unique adventure experience

This game is rated: (E) for Everyone. "Graded by the developer"
